heading: Violation of closure order
text:
It shall be unlawful for any person to use or occupy or to permit any other person to use or
occupy any building or part thereof or vacant land that has been sealed, padlocked, or otherwise closed pursuant to an order of the
commissioner. It shall be unlawful to mutilate or remove a posted order of the commissioner. Intentional disobe dience or violation of
any provision of a closure order shall be punishable as an immediately hazardous violation.
